text: @SpeakerPelosi @SenSchumer Wuhan 400🦠You can become an infectious carrier only four hours after coming into contact with the virus.  It's an incredibly short incubation period.  Once infected, no one lives more than twenty-four hours.  Most die within twelve hours.The death rate is one hundred percent.
